question: Which Indian Tennis player has been given a singles wildcard entry for the Australian Open 2021?
explanation:
The 23-year-old Indian tennis player Sumit Nagal has been given a singles wildcard entry for the Australian Open 2021.
Sumit and Wang Xiyu of China will compete in the main draw of the event. Former world number one Andy Murray has received a wild-card entry into the event, which is going to take place at Melbourne park in February 2020.
